title: Leeds vs Arsenal : Predicted lineup today and confirmed team news
body_text:
Arsenal have cruised to a dominant win over Leeds United to open up a seven point lead at the summit of the Premier League.
After defeat to Manchester United last weekend that allowed Manchester City and Aston Villa to close the gap on them, the Gunners delivered an emphatic response to those doubting their title credentials at Elland Road.
Goals from Martin Zubimendi, an own goal from Karl Darlow, Viktor Gyokeres and Gabriel Jesus sealed the emphatic win on the road that will have eased some of the nerves beginning to build back at the Emirates.
Mikel Arteta opted to leave his captain Martin Odegaard out his starting XI after his disappointing performance last week with Kai Havertz starting his first league match in almost a year.
Bukayo Saka was also withdrawn from the starting XI minutes before kick-off with what appeared to be a groin injury with Noni Madueke brought into replace him.
The former Chelsea star was without an assist in the league all season but was the provider for Zubimendi’s header on 27 minutes. It was his corner too that caused havoc in the box 11 minutes later with Darlow punching into his own net.
Get your football fix

From the latest transfer rumours and managerial moves to analysis of the biggest games and a lot more, our experts have you covered.
Sign up here, it's an open goal.
Viktor Gyokeres ended his long wait for a league goal with 20 minutes remaining, capping a much-improved performance with a neat finish from Gabriel Martinelli’s cross.
More Trending
Gabriel Jesus, off the bench to replace the Swede, added a fourth late on.
Arsenal’s win puts the pressure back on City and Villa to keep pace on Sunday. They are in action away to Tottenham and at home to Brentford respectively.
Relive the action with Metro’s LIVE matchday blog.
Live Feed
This Live Blog has now ended
This blog is now closed. For the latest updates, visit Metro’s Football page.
FULL-TIME! Leeds 0-4 Arsenal
What a response from Arsenal! They are seven points clear at the top again.
Leeds 0-4 Arsenal
90 mins | Four minutes added on here.
Leeds 0-4 Arsenal
89 mins | They all want one now – Martinelli is the latest to have a pop but Darlow makes the save.
Leeds 0-4 Arsenal
88 mins | Third time lucky for Jesus! Odegaard finds him and the Brazil international dances past his marker with a sublime dummy to make room for the shot. The finish is class, steering it into the bottom corner.
GOAL! Leeds 0-4 Arsenal | Gabriel Jesus, 86 mins
Now Jesus has his goal!
Leeds 0-3 Arsenal
79 mins | Jesus denied again! Timber this time does brilliantly to lift the ball into him but his header is pushed away by Darlow.
It is starting to hammer it down at Elland Road now; a few of the home fans have decided to call it a day.
Leeds 0-3 Arsenal
77 mins | And Jesus should score straight away! It’s a brilliant run from Rice who tees up the Brazilian but he sends his shot wide.
Leeds 0-3 Arsenal
74 mins | Two more changes for the Gunners, Gabriel Jesus and Riccardo Calafiori are on for Hincapie and Gyokeres.
Leeds 0-3 Arsenal
71 mins | They have had to weather the storm a bit, but Arsenal are on their way to victory now. It’s good work from Martinelli who beats Struijk to lift the ball in towards the big Swede who volleys home.
GOAL! Leeds 0-3 Arsenal | Viktor Gyokeres, 69 mins
Arsenal can breathe easy!
Leeds 0-2 Arsenal
62 mins | There is definitely still a bit of life in Leeds – get one back at the roof is going to come off this place.
Leeds 0-2 Arsenal
60 mins | Martin Odegaard and Gabriel Martinelli are on for Havertz and Madueke.
Madueke could have had three assists today but leaves with two – a good day at the office after he was drafted in just minutes before kick-off.
Leeds 0-2 Arsenal
58 mins | Timber picks up a booking after blocking Gudmundsson. Arsenal scramble the free kick clear and we are about to have our first Arsenal substitutions of the game.
Leeds 0-2 Arsenal
54 mins | Okafor is involved again after Leeds eventually find a way in behind that Arsenal defence but his looping effort is collected by Raya.
Leeds 0-2 Arsenal
52 mins | Big chance for an Arsenal third! Madueke swings in another excellent cross but Timber glances it over the bar.
Leeds 0-2 Arsenal
48 mins | Much better from Leeds in these opening few minutes. Okafor, off the bench alongside Longstaff at half-time is causing problems and Leeds have a corner.
Struijk is onto it and draws the first save out of the afternoon out of Raya.
SECOND-HALF UNDERWAY!
Have Leeds got something to show here?
HALF-TIME! Leeds 0-2 Arsenal
The Gunners are on top and going seven points clear again if it stays this way.
Leeds 0-2 Arsenal
45 mins | Two minuted added on at the end of the first-half.
